subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: An 18-5 run to open the third quarter gave the Bobcats a 74-59 lead, and Charlotte never trailed after that. The Knicks have not won two games in a row since a three-game winning streak from Jan. 3-10.
snippet: An 18-5 run to open the third quarter gave the Bobcats a 74-59 lead, and Charlotte never trailed after that. The Knicks have not won two games in a row since a three-game winning streak from Jan. 3-10.
